name: mash
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to crush food, usually after cooking it, so that it forms a soft mass: Mash the potatoes and then mix in the butter and herbs.
mainly US informal to violently crush part of a body or an object: His face was badly mashed up in the accident.
